Name: Ecio
About the game: Heartbroken man tries to change himself in order to reconcile with the girl he loves. He wants to be a better person, wants to be good enough for her. But changing has never been easy and who knows what he has to sacrifice. Ecio is a 2D platformer game with story, where player needs to advance through dangerous levels, gain new powers throughout your journey to overcome obstacles, and finally defeat boss to achieve the final goal. Run, jump, evade, hide, but donâ€™t let your hope die. Fight your way out, and if the game is hard, feel free to cry!
